overview: Kalmus is after the freight contract held by Summers. When his gang kill Summers, Tex and Duke step in to help Madge keep the freight line going. When they foil the gang's further attempts, Kalmus gets the Judge to jail the two.
tagline: ROMANCE RIDES With TEX RITTER and "WHITE FLASH" in a RIP-ROARIN' SAGA OF THE OLD WEST!
title: Sing Cowboy Sing
